price: و قوم نوح را كه ستمكارتر و سركش‌تر بودند نیز پیش از آن [هلاک نمود]؛
arabic: وَقَوۡمَ نُوحٖ مِّن قَبۡلُۖ إِنَّهُمۡ كَانُواْ هُمۡ أَظۡلَمَ وَأَطۡغَىٰ

version.title: Persian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Persian by the team of the Persian language in Rowwad Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: waqawma nūḥin min qablu innahum kānū hum aẓlama wa-aṭghā
